exceptions.tactic: intros u v Zodd_v Zodd_u Hyp1 Hyp2 Hyp3 Hyp4 Hyp5 Hyp6.
pose proof (Zodd_mult _ _ Zodd_u Zodd_v) as [s [w [Eq1 | Eq2]]].
exceptions.exn: The reference Zodd_v was not found in the current environment.
The reference s was not found in the current environment.

original: intros u v Zodd_v Zodd_u Hyp1 Hyp2 Hyp3 Hyp4 Hyp5 Hyp6. pose proof (Zodd_mult _ _ Zodd_u Zodd_v) as [s [w [Eq1 | Eq2]]]. - exists (s, w). split. + split; [|right]. simpl in Eq1. auto. + split; [auto | split; [auto | apply gcd2_relp_odd; auto]]. - exists (w, s). split. + split; [|left]. simpl in Eq2. auto. + split; [auto | split; [auto | apply gcd2_relp_odd; auto]].
